description: Modernized premium dark theme with heavy glass-morphism, Jumper orange (#FA4721) accents, and comprehensive data visualization. Features 22+ slide patterns, 6 chart types (including Gauge), hybrid navigation (scroll-snap + click), and external CSS for token optimization. Designed to exceed Koko Classic v3 capabilities with Jumper's bold brand identity.

changes: Complete modernization from v1 (9 patterns) to v2 (22+ patterns)
External CSS file for token optimization (~2000 lines)
6 chart types: Line, Bar, Donut, Funnel, Stacked Area, Gauge (new)
CSS custom properties for complete theming control
Semantic color system for data visualization

section_3_conteudo.purpose: Core content, data presentation, and key insights

section_4_analise.purpose: Deep analysis, successes, challenges, and structured data

section_6_encerramento.purpose: Action items, summary, and professional closing

patterns.name: Hero Cover Slide
patterns.description: Full-width dramatic cover with organic gradient background, centered logo, large title, and metadata. Heavy glass-morphism title container with orange accent border.
patterns.when_to_use: First slide of presentation, dramatic opening, back cover (with different content)
patterns.example: Jumper Logo + RELATÓRIO DE PERFORMANCE + Cliente: Acme Corp + Período: Outubro 2024

patterns.name: Table of Contents
patterns.description: Funnel-style table of contents with progressively narrowing blocks. Each section clickable with smooth scroll navigation. Glass-morphism cards with hover effects.
patterns.when_to_use: Second slide after cover, providing presentation roadmap
patterns.example: SUMÁRIO: Descoberta (100% width) → Análise (90%) → Resultados (80%) → Próximos Passos (70%)

patterns.name: Section Divider
patterns.description: Clean centered divider with badge, large section title, and optional subtitle. Minimal design with maximum impact.
patterns.when_to_use: Between major sections to signal topic change
patterns.example: Badge: SEÇÃO 02 + RESULTADOS + Análise detalhada do período

patterns.name: Cards Grid (Executive Summary)
patterns.description: Responsive auto-fit grid (3-4 columns) with heavy glass-morphism cards. Each card has title and content/metric. Orange hover glow effect.
patterns.when_to_use: Executive summary, presenting 3-6 related concepts, feature lists, objectives overview
patterns.example: RESUMO EXECUTIVO: Investimento R$ 50K | Conversões 1.200 | ROAS 4.2x | CPA R$ 41,67

patterns.name: Metric Cards (KPIs)
patterns.description: 3-column grid of compact metric cards designed for quick KPI scanning. Large value with label, optional trend indicator.
patterns.when_to_use: Showing 3-6 key performance indicators side-by-side
patterns.example: MÉTRICAS PRINCIPAIS: Investimento R$ 50.000 | Conversões 1.200 | CAC R$ 41,67

patterns.name: Comparison Grid (Before/After)
patterns.description: Two-column side-by-side comparison with large stats. Semantic color coding (red for before/problem, green for after/solution).
patterns.when_to_use: Showing improvements, validating results, comparing scenarios
patterns.example: ANTES: CPA R$ 2,50 (vermelho) | DEPOIS: CPA R$ 0,85 (verde) = -66% improvement

patterns.name: Timeline (Temporal Evolution)
patterns.description: Vertical timeline with orange accent line and data points. Each point shows date, value, and trend. Sequential fade-in animation.
patterns.when_to_use: Time-series narrative, week-by-week evolution, project phases, milestones
patterns.example: Semana 1: CPA R$ 2,03 → Semana 2: R$ 1,85 (-9%) → Semana 3: R$ 1,45 (-22%)

patterns.name: Statement Slide (Text Left, Visual Right)
patterns.description: 50/50 split layout with bold text statement on left and supporting visual/metric on right. Orange accent on key text.
patterns.when_to_use: Major insights, turning points, critical findings requiring emphasis
patterns.example: INSIGHT CRÍTICO: Google Search supera Display em 8.2x no CPA + Large metric visualization

patterns.name: Statement Slide Reverse (Visual Left, Text Right)
patterns.description: Reverse 50/50 layout with visual/graphic on left and bold text on right. Maximum visual impact.
patterns.when_to_use: Most impactful insights, dramatic reveals, memorable statements
patterns.example: (Large metric/chart) + 'Redução de 66% no CPA em apenas 3 semanas'

patterns.name: Checklist (Completed Actions)
patterns.description: List of completed items with green checkmark icons. Each item has bold label and description. Staggered animation.
patterns.when_to_use: Showing accomplished tasks, delivered features, completed phases
required_elements: checklist-items with check icon, item-title, item-description
patterns.example: AÇÕES REALIZADAS: ✓ Otimização de Budget | ✓ Novos Criativos | ✓ Testes A/B

patterns.name: Big Number (Hero Metric)
patterns.description: Massive centered number in orange with supporting label and context. Maximum emphasis for single most important metric.
patterns.when_to_use: Emphasizing THE most important metric or achievement
patterns.example: 750 (huge orange) + Conversões Alcançadas + +287% vs período anterior

patterns.name: Content Slide (What Worked)
patterns.description: Standard content slide with title, subtitle, and card grid showing successful items. Green success badges.
patterns.when_to_use: Presenting successes, what worked well, positive outcomes
patterns.example: O QUE FUNCIONOU: Google Search (sucesso) | Criativos em Vídeo (sucesso) | Budget Flexível

patterns.name: Challenges Slide
patterns.description: Content slide focused on challenges with warning/critical badges. Semantic colors indicate severity.
patterns.when_to_use: Presenting challenges faced, obstacles encountered, areas needing attention
patterns.example: DESAFIOS: Display Performance (crítico) | Budget Limitado (moderado) | Sazonalidade

patterns.name: Learnings & Insights
patterns.description: Content slide for key learnings and actionable insights. Info badges with blue accent.
patterns.when_to_use: Presenting lessons learned, key insights, recommendations
patterns.example: APRENDIZADOS: Search > Display | Vídeo performa melhor | Horários de pico identificados

patterns.name: Data Table (Structured Comparison)
patterns.description: Full data table with headers and rows. Semantic color coding for values, status badges, alternating row backgrounds.
patterns.when_to_use: Comparing metrics across multiple channels/campaigns with detailed numerical data
patterns.example: Google Search: CPA R$ 0,85 (Excelente) | Meta: CPA R$ 1,20 (Bom) | Display: CPA R$ 7,00 (Crítico)

patterns.name: Line Chart (Temporal Evolution)
patterns.description: SVG line chart showing evolution over time. 60% chart area, 40% insights panel. Orange line with gradient fill.
patterns.when_to_use: Showing trends, week-over-week changes, growth curves
patterns.example: Conversões ao longo de 5 semanas: 120 → 185 → 320 → 410 → 465

patterns.name: Bar Chart (Horizontal Comparison)
patterns.description: Horizontal bar chart with semantic colors. Green for success, yellow for neutral, red for critical. Value labels at end of bars.
patterns.when_to_use: Comparing performance across categories (channels, campaigns)
patterns.example: Google Ads: ROAS 5.2x (verde) | Meta Ads: ROAS 4.1x (amarelo) | Display: ROAS 0.6x (vermelho)

patterns.name: Donut Chart (Distribution)
patterns.description: SVG donut chart with center total value. 50% chart area, 50% legend with details. Animated segment draw.
patterns.when_to_use: Showing percentage breakdowns, budget distribution, composition
patterns.example: Investimento Total R$ 300K: Google 60% | Meta 30% | Display 10%

patterns.name: Funnel Chart (Conversion Path)
patterns.description: 4-5 stage trapezoid funnel with progressive narrowing. Drop-off percentage badges between stages.
patterns.when_to_use: Showing multi-stage conversion process with metrics and drop-off rates
patterns.example: Impressões (100K) → Cliques (15K, 15%) → Leads (2K, 13%) → Vendas (500, 25%)

patterns.name: Stacked Area Chart (Multi-Channel)
patterns.description: SVG stacked area showing 3+ channels evolution over time. 60% chart, 40% legend. Each channel has distinct color.
patterns.when_to_use: Showing how multiple channels contribute to total over time
patterns.example: Conversões Google + Meta + TikTok empilhadas ao longo de 5 semanas

patterns.name: Gauge Chart (Goal Progress)
patterns.description: Semi-circular gauge showing progress toward goal. Color-coded zones (red/yellow/green). Center displays current value and percentage.
patterns.when_to_use: Showing progress toward a goal, performance scores, quota achievement
patterns.example: Meta de Conversões: 750/1000 (75%) - Zona verde, no caminho certo

patterns.name: Next Steps Slide
patterns.description: Numbered action items in glass-morphism cards. Clear hierarchy of priorities. Orange accent on numbers.
patterns.when_to_use: Presenting actionable next steps, recommendations, action items
patterns.example: PRÓXIMOS PASSOS: 1. Escalar Search | 2. Pausar Display | 3. Testar TikTok

patterns.name: Conclusion Slide
patterns.description: Centered layout with large title and key message in glass-morphism box. Orange accent emphasis.
patterns.when_to_use: Second-to-last slide, summarizing key takeaways
patterns.example: CONCLUSÃO + Box: Estratégia de Search validada. Escalar para R$ 100K/mês.

patterns.name: Back Cover (Closing)
patterns.description: Mirrored hero slide for professional closing. Logo, thank you message, contact information.
patterns.when_to_use: Last slide of presentation
patterns.example: Jumper Logo + OBRIGADO + contato@jumper.studio + Agendar Próxima Reunião

pattern_selection_rules: Always start with hero-slide for cover
Use table-of-contents after hero for presentations with 10+ slides
Use section-divider before each major topic change
Place metric-cards early for quick KPI overview
Use comparison-grid when showing before/after or A/B results
Choose chart type based on data: line for trends, bar for comparison, donut for distribution, funnel for conversion, gauge for goals
End with next-steps → conclusion → back-cover sequence
Use statement slides for single most important insights

content_density_guidelines.hero-slide: Minimal: logo + title + subtitle + 1-2 metadata items
content_density_guidelines.cards-grid: 3-6 cards maximum, each with title + short content

semantic_color_usage.success: #2AA876 - Use for positive outcomes, wins, improvements
semantic_color_usage.warning: #F59E0B - Use for neutral/caution items, moderate issues
semantic_color_usage.critical: #EF4444 - Use for problems, failures, items needing attention
semantic_color_usage.primary: #FA4721 - Use for emphasis, CTAs, key highlights
